name: Salomon X Access 70 Wide Ski Boots - Women's
description: Ski better with less effort. You can charge a little harder this season without making your feet hammered. Refined for female feet, the cuff and liner are sculpted to eleviate ankle slop and heel lift. The liner is comfortable enough to ski out of the box, but it can also be thermo-moulded for an instant oh-yeah fit. These progressive boots are just the ticket for slamming down the slopes without any regrets.Twinframe technology in the shell provides progressive flex without overpowering stiffness.Flex sport liner can be thermo-moulded for an instant custom fit.Oversized pivot transfers power smoothly and efficiently.Women's specific cuff and liner are tailored to female anatomy.Calf adjuster lets you find the right height in the back of the shell.4 aluminum buckles and a 35 mm strap secures the foot.104mm last accommodates wide feet or gives room for thicker socks.Alpine soles and Grip-Walk ready.
